post:
Christmas is around the corner and the countdown can officially begin.

To build up to christmas, we will be offering some fantastic specials weekly which will only get better right up to christmas through to new years day.
Keep an eye on our social media or newletters for further upcoming specials.

There has never been a better time to join HostDoc and experience the stability, performance and uptime you have been in search of at a low end price.

To kick off the festivities, we have an unbeatable offer in Dallas and 2 fantastic offers in  London and Singapore.

Dual Intel Xeon Gold 6128 - Dallas
• 1 vCore
• 3GB Dedicated RAM
• 10 GB NVMe SSD or 40GB HDD
• 3 TB Bandwidth @ 10gbps
• 1 IPv4
• /64 IPv6
